data.title: Prior Scientific
data.text:
News: USA

The PureFocus850 – Ultimate in High Speed Microscope Auto Focus

Posted on: Feb 5th 2019

Prior Scientific is proud to announce the release of its new PureFocus 850 a revolutionary autofocus for biological and industrial imaging. The PureFocus 850 is a fast, precise and accurate focusing system that has been design to fit both upright and inverted microscopes using infinity corrected optics.

Queensgate Instruments has been acquired by Prior Scientific Instruments Ltd

Posted on: May 25th 2018

Prior Scientific Instruments are global leaders in delivering high precision motorized stages, microscope automation products and specialty opto-mechanical automation systems. Queensgate instruments designs and produces leading performance nano positioning and measurement systems used in a wide range of applications from atomic force microscopy, hard disc testing, lithography and metrology. Both companies have significant experience delivering customised solutions […]

Prior Scientific, releases new warranty;

Posted on: May 2nd 2017

Prior Scientific announces an enhanced warranty for their products. Our new improved warranty for motorized stages is five (5) years from the date of purchase (only when used with a Prior controller) for controllers three (3) years and for Prior Scientific’s custom-built products one (1) year. This reflects Prior Scientific’s strong commitment to quality, precision […]

Prior Scientific Announces Enhanced Warranty Policy

Posted on: Apr 28th 2017

Prior Scientific announces an enhanced warranty for their products. Our new improved warranty for motorized stages is five (5) years from the date of purchase only when used with a Prior controller, for controllers three (3) years and for Prior Scientific’s custom-built products one (1) year. This reflects Prior Scientific’s strong commitment to quality, precision […]

Motorized Platforms and Micromanipulators for Electrophysiology Applications

Posted on: Aug 30th 2016

Learn more about how our motorized XY stages, ZDeck platforms, micromanipulators and post mounts are being utilized in electrophysiology applications. Download datasheet

XY Stages from Prior Scientific for the New Nikon Ts2R Intermediate Sized Inverted Research Microscope

Posted on: Jul 26th 2016

Prior Scientific is pleased to announce that both the ProScanTM H117 high precision motorized flat top stage and the IS102/103 OptiScanTM series microscope automation components are compatible with the new Ts2R and Ts2R-FL inverted research microscopes from Nikon. The Eclipse Ts2R is a compact inverted research microscope that is configurable with a wide variety of […]

Accurate Quantitative Imaging with the LumaSpec 800

Posted on: Jul 25th 2016

Learn more about how the LumaSpec 800 Optical Power Meter is providing quantitative spectral data to track performance of a light source in a biopharmaceutical laboratory. Download datasheet

ZDeck Platform Provides the Ideal Solution for In-vivo Image Application

Posted on: Apr 4th 2016

Prior Scientific reports that its collaboration with Neurotar (Helsinki, Finland) has produced a seamlessly integrated solution for in vivo microscopic imaging in the brain of awake and moving rodents. The solution is based upon Prior’s ultra-stable and easily adjustable ZDeck platform. Neurotar’s Mobile HomeCage™ is an accessory device for microscopy and electrophysiology, which enables high […]

Introducing The Lumen 100-LED Fluorescence Illumination System

Posted on: Dec 3rd 2015

The new Lumen 100-LED illuminator provides advanced, high quality illumination for a wide range of fluorescence microscopy applications. With a 25,000 hour lifetime, the Lumen 100-LED offers a broad array of LED’s covering wavelengths throughout the visible spectrum and is suitable for the majority of fluorophores used in fluorescence applications. A wide range of adapters are available to […]

Prior Scientific Announce New Senior Management Appointments

Posted on: Nov 1st 2015

Prior Scientific, a global leader in precision instrumentation has announced changes to the executive leadership team. After a successful seven years with Prior Scientific, Managing Director, Dr. Monika Maintz has resigned and will be moving on to manage a Cambridgeshire based charity. “We want to thank Monika for her extraordinary accomplishments with Prior.” Says Tom Freda, […]
